job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: Remitly is on a mission to transform the lives of immigrants and their families by providing the most trusted financial products and services on the planet For nearly 10 years we have been tirelessly delivering on our promises to immigrants sending their hard earned money home Today we are incredibly proud to have served millions of customers globally with Remitly and our newly launched Passbook app to provide immigrants access to banking We strive daily to meet our promise to our customers by building peace of mind into everything we do Join over 1300 employees across 9 offices who are growing their careers while having a positive impact on people globallyltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtAbout The RoleltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtAs a Machine Learning Engineer MLE you will report to the tech lead of Machine Learning Products As a part of this team you will help support the MLdata products that underpin our business You will help scale datadriven decisionmaking throughout the organization provide ML supportbest practices to partner teams and help explore new ML product opportunitiesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtYou WillltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtSupport data products that set customer foreign exchange rates detect bad actors using our product draw inferences from customer behavior and forecast currency volume in addition to creating new data products that solve interesting problemsltligtltligtBuild production data products that provide data derived results in realtime or batchltligtltligtProvide insightful statistical analysis that extracts value from complex datasets and achieves targeted outcomesltligtltligtAdvocate for machine learning best practices throughout the organizationltligtltligtHave a significant impact on Remitlys bottom lineltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtYou Haveltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt24 years of work experience building production ready systems and delivering data products to partnersltligtltligt24 years experience applying statistics and machine learning to problems that resulted in datadriven impactltligtltligtSolid knowledge of both the theory and application of ML algorithmsltligtltligtPractical knowledge of objectoriented programming in PythonltligtltligtSolid knowledge of SQL and Python ML libraries eg scikitlearn scipy numpy matplotlib pandasltligtltligtWorking knowledge of software engineering practices including code reviews build processes testing and operationsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtOur BenefitsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtUnlimited paid time offltligtltligtHealth dental and vision benefits  401k plan with company matchingltligtltligtCompany contributions to your HSA or FSA plan if you choose oneltligtltligtContinuing education and corridor travel benefitsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtRemitly is an Equal Opportunity Employerltstronggt Equal employment opportunity has been and will continue to be a fundamental principle at Remitly
